message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this fantastic product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. This is a one-time opportunity to get your hands on this incredible product, and I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share such a valuable product. However, based on my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1050000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to accept your proposal of $1050000. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $1080000. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to an agreement.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand your perspective, I must respectfully decline your proposal at $1080000. My maximum budget remains at $1050000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution soon.
